job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create tools and features, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, particularly generative AI techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building web applications, integrating front-end and back-end, which is a direct indicator of Software Development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence emphasizes the integration of AI features into a larger product strategy, implying full-stack development and product ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence emphasizes the integration of AI features into a larger product strategy, implying full-stack development and product ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This directly states the expectation of integrating both front-end and back-end development, which is a core aspect of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the full-stack development aspect and the responsibility of translating ideas into products, which is a key Software Development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: Owning the entire development process from requirements to launch and iteration implies aspects of MLOps, especially in managing the lifecycle of AI products.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on understanding the impact on students and meeting their needs, which reflects a business understanding of the educational context.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the overarching goal of accelerating learning outcomes and efficiency for students, which demonstrates a focus on business and user impact.

soft_skills.phrase: This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.

You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with cutting-edge LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create innovative tools and interactive features. It also requires integrating these AI capabilities into full-stack web applications and taking ownership of the product lifecycle, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
